quest.name: Gastornis Groove
journal:
Muna Vanu is pulling at his feathers, fretting over something.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Muna Vanu is working on a gift to present to the Zundu in recognition of their kindness in accepting the Gundu. However, what he currently has to show for his efforts is decidedly plain. He asks that you procure something bright and colorful with which to decorate it. Luna Vanu may be able to help in this regard.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Luna Vanu suggests gastornis feathers─lustrous and iridescent, they can even be gathered without engaging in the hazardous business of slaying the gastornis themselves. Search Cloudtop for the nests of these beasts and recover three of their feathers.
You gather three gastornis feathers as requested, their opalescent hue shimmering as they flutter in the breeze. Return these marvelous specimens to Luna Vanu.
The Gundu merchant opines on the beauty of the feathers when you deliver them to him. They will no doubt be a superb addition to the gift Muna Vanu plans to present to the Zundu.
objectives: Gather downy gastornis feathers from gastornis nests.
Deliver the feathers to Luna Vanu.

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Perhaps if Muna Vanu plucks off own feathers, then─ Oh! Forename! Your arrival is as unexpected─and welcome─as refreshing summer shower!

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Gundu wish to honor kind Zundu with gift of appreciation. But we have no materials to decorate gift worthy of such charitable tribe.

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: But netherling can help! SheHe and trader Luna Vanu can gather materials so Muna Vanu can make gift that honors tribe.

dialogue.name: LUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Muna Vanu thinks to use own feathers for decorations!? Muna Vanu's feathers are dull and tattered─might just as well use thatch!

dialogue.name: LUNAVANU
dialogue.text: We need soft, fluffy feathers, with colors brilliant and iridescent as rainbow after midday summer shower. Hmmm... Feathers of gastornis are most ideal.

dialogue.name: LUNAVANU
dialogue.text: If netherling travels to Cloudtop and gathers three gastornis feathers, Luna Vanu is very grateful! Beasts need not be slain─feathers can be found in nests of gastornis.

dialogue.name: LUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Feathers of gastornis are most brilliant and lustrous. Find them at Cloudtop.

dialogue.name: LUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Netherling returns! Does shehe have beautiful gastornis feathers?

dialogue.name: LUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Luna Vanu is right to rely on Forename. Feathers of Muna Vanu are hard and dull, like long-dead tree. But these feathers are soft and colorful, like sprightly young sapling, resplendent with fresh blossoms!

dialogue.name: LUNAVANU
dialogue.text: These feathers let us make mask more beautiful than field, lush and rampant with wildflowers. I make beautiful gift to show true appreciation for Zundu!
